title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Civil Litigation Blended Education Program: WeChat-Based Learning Pathway

context.prior_knowledge: Basic legal concepts and fundamental principles of civil law
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners acquire civil litigation-related knowledge with 85% or higher accuracy using a BPSO algorithm-based WeChat learning path system.
Learners reproduce civil litigation procedures (from filing a lawsuit to enforcement of judgment) with 90% or higher accuracy through VR simulations.
Learners improve self-directed learning abilities in blended learning environments by 10% or more.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
